item.author: shesl-meow@qq.com (佘崧林)
item.description: lab 7-3 QUESTION 1 How does this program achieve persistence to ensure that it continues running when the computer is restarted? 首先查看函数导入表，发现 Lab07-03.exe 这个文件有导入一个 CopyFileA 这个敏感函数。 然后我们分析这个可执行文件的伪代码。伪
